item.title: [Python] Create a LINEBot with Django
item.description: #Introduction I summarized the article about using LINEBot with Django because it was a little researched and it was old. For the time being, I will create an Omukai Bot that returns the text sent as an introduction to LINE Bot. Here article uses SDK, but I’m a Python beginner ~~ I can’t even throw an HTTP request with Python ~~ I want to do it. I’m a Django beginner with less than a week of Django history.

item.title: [Python] I'm in Singapore right now, a story about creating a LineBot and wanting to do a memorable job
item.description: # "Sorry, don't go to class" This CM with a strong impact. I love this, so if you invite me to a class “I’m in Singapore now” I have made a LineBot that will reply to me. In addition, various specifications that further enhance the feeling of ** Even if it doesn’t remain on the map, I want to make it a memorable job of the person who used it!

item.title: [Python] Serverless LINE bot made with IBM Cloud Functions
item.description: # This year again IBM Cloud × LINE bot In last year’s Advent Calendar, we introduced How to make a LINE bot using IBM Cloud Node-RED. Thanks to the Advent Calendar, a recent Google search for “Node-RED LINE bot” has brought this article to the top. It is good to easily create a LINE bot with Node-RED, but in the case of IBM Cloud’s Node-RED, if you do not edit the flow for a while with a light plan, the application will stop and the LINE bot may not work.

item.title: [Python] If the engineer asked for entertainment at the reception
[Python] When I tried to make a morphological analysis BOT using the trendy LINE BOT API, it became a read through BOT
item.description: #background Recently, LINE BOT API is popular (is it slow to notice?) According to official announcements and press releases What is “BOT API Trial Account”? With the BOT API Trial Account, you can try the API development that enables two-way communication between your service and LINE users. Introduction of BOT API Trial Account | LINE Business Center Prior to the opening of a messaging API that allows corporate accounts to interact with users in a conversational manner, open to the first 10,000 third-party developers.
